TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CodeIdentifiers extends System.Object

summary.span: 針對由 .NET Framework 之 XML 序列化 (Serialization) 基礎結構所產生的相關程式碼實體 (Entity) 或型別對應，維護名稱群組。

span.span: Maintains a group of names for related code entities or type mappings that are generated by the .NET Framework's XML serialization infrastructure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下列清單識別工具和類別使用:The following list identifies tools and classes that use the : - [Web 服務描述語言工具 (Wsdl.exe)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9210348-8bc2-4367-8c91-d1a04b403e88)，或類別，產生用戶端 proxy 類別或抽象伺服器類別，從 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 文件時。The [Web Services Description Language Tool (Wsdl.exe)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9210348-8bc2-4367-8c91-d1a04b403e88), or the class, while generating client proxy classes or abstract server classes from a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document. - [XML 結構描述定義工具 (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md)從 XML 結構描述定義 (XSD) 文件產生類別時的工具。The [XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md) tool while generating classes from XML Schema Definition (XSD) documents. - 類別建立時物件類別識別為 Web 服務，透過從屬性。The class while creating objects from classes that are identified as Web services via the attribute. 而不是使用直接類別中，使用上述的工具或類別。Instead of using the class directly, use the aforementioned tools or classes. 如果您想要控制繫結至 XML 結構描述或 Web 服務定義的程式碼實體的名稱，使用相關聯的屬性。If you want to control the names of code entities that are bound to XML Schema or Web service definitions, use the associated attributes. 其範圍中，根據執行個體可以用來維護的任何下列清單中的項目名稱：Depending on its scope, a instance can be used to maintain the names of any of the items in the following list: - 型別、 方法或欄位。Types, methods, or fields. - 參數和傳回值對應至 WSDL 方法的輸入和輸出訊息。The parameters and return value of a method corresponding to WSDL input and output messages. - 物件內可以序列化為 WSDL 文件的執行個體。Objects within a instance that can be serialized to a WSDL document. 通常，此類別用來避免命名衝突，包括包含實體的名稱衝突的特定範圍內的程式碼實體之間。Typically, the class is used to avoid naming collisions between code entities within a particular scope, including collisions with the name of a containing entity.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

param.span: 如果識別項要區分大小寫，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if identifiers are case sensitive; otherwise, .

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，並判斷程式碼識別項是否要區分大小寫。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and determines whether code identifiers are case sensitive.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Add (string identifier, object value);
.method public hidebysig instance void Add(string identifier, object value) cil managed
Public Sub Add (identifier As String, value As Object)
public: void Add(System::String ^ identifier, System::Object ^ value);

param.name: identifier
param.span: 用於索引程式碼實體的名稱。

span.span: A name that is used to index the code entity.

param.name: value
param.span: 程式碼實體或型別對應資訊。

span.span: The code entity or type mapping information.

summary.span: 將具名的程式碼實體或型別對應加入至 執行個體的範圍中。

span.span: Adds a named code entity or type mapping to the instance's scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同於方法，方法不會防止命名衝突。Unlike the method, the method does not prevent naming collisions. 如果您想要控制繫結至 XML 結構描述或 Web 服務定義的程式碼實體的名稱，使用相關聯的屬性而建立的執行個體類別。If you want to control the names of code entities that are bound to XML Schema or Web service definitions, use the associated attributes rather than creating an instance of the class. 如需完整清單，請參閱 < [ 屬性控制 XML 序列化的](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md)。For a complete list, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddReserved(string identifier) cil managed

param.name: identifier
param.span: 無法用於 執行個體之範圍內的名稱。

span.span: A name that will not be available within the instance's scope.

summary.span: 防止在 執行個體的範圍內使用指定的名稱。

span.span: Prevents a specified name from being used within the instance's scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 保留的名稱可以屬於包含的程式碼實體，例如產生的型別為其成員名稱必須也是。A reserved name can belong to a containing code entity, such as a type for which member names must also be generated.

MemberSignature.Value: public string AddUnique (string identifier, object value);
.method public hidebysig instance string AddUnique(string identifier, object value) cil managed
Public Function AddUnique (identifier As String, value As Object) As String
public: System::String ^ AddUnique(System::String ^ identifier, System::Object ^ value);

param.name: identifier
param.span: 用於索引程式碼實體的候選名稱。

span.span: A candidate name that is used to index the code entity.

param.name: value
param.span: 程式碼實體或型別對應資訊。

span.span: The code entity or type mapping information.

summary.span: 將具名的程式碼實體或型別對應加入至 執行個體的範圍內，並確保該名稱在範圍內是唯一的。

span.span: Adds a named code entity or type mapping to the instance's scope, ensuring that the name is unique within the scope.

returns.span: 識別項參數值，但如果發生名稱衝突，則為修改的字串。

span.span: The identifier parameter value or a modified string if there is a name collision.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果識別項參數值不是唯一產生並在其位置中使用執行個體的範圍，是新的唯一字串。If the identifier parameter value is not unique within the instance's scope, a new, unique string is generated and used in its place. 將附加至輸入的名稱，會產生新的字串。The new string is generated by appending to the input name. 原始名稱不是唯一，如果它先前傳遞至， ，或方法，或如果它由先前呼叫產生方法。The original name is not unique if it was passed previously to the , , or method, or if it was generated by a previous call to the method. 在每個案例中，如果新的識別項不是唯一的則會先傳遞到方法用來建立新的唯一識別碼。In each case, if the new identifier is not unique, it is first passed to the method to create a new unique identifier. 如果您想要控制繫結至 XML 結構描述或 Web 服務定義的程式碼實體的名稱，使用相關聯的屬性而建立的執行個體類別。If you want to control the names of code entities that are bound to XML Schema or Web service definitions, use the associated attributes rather than creating an instance of the class. 如需完整清單，請參閱 < [ 屬性控制 XML 序列化的](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md)。For a complete list, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Clear() cil managed

summary.span: 從 執行個體的範圍中移除所有程式碼實體或型別對應，包括其名稱。

span.span: Removes all code entities or type mappings, including their names, from the instance's scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 保留名稱，透過新增方法，不會移除。Reserved names, as added through the method, are not removed. 如果您想要控制繫結至 XML 結構描述或 Web 服務定義的程式碼實體的名稱，使用相關聯的屬性而建立的執行個體類別。If you want to control the names of code entities that are bound to XML Schema or Web service definitions, use the associated attributes rather than creating an instance of the class. 如需完整清單，請參閱 < [ 屬性控制 XML 序列化的](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md)。For a complete list, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 輸入的名稱不是唯一，如果它先前傳遞至， ，或方法，或如果它由產生方法。The input name is not unique if it was passed previously to the , , or method, or if it was generated by the method. 如果您想要控制繫結至 XML 結構描述或 Web 服務定義的程式碼實體的名稱，使用相關聯的屬性而建立的執行個體類別。If you want to control the names of code entities that are bound to XML Schema or Web service definitions, use the associated attributes rather than creating an instance of the class. 如需完整清單，請參閱 < [ 屬性控制 XML 序列化的](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md)。For a complete list, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string MakeRightCase(string identifier) cil managed
Public Function MakeRightCase (identifier As String) As String

span.span: The name to possibly modify.

summary.span: 根據 屬性的值來修改名稱，藉以確保輸入的大小寫是正確的。

span.span: Ensures that the input is of the correct case by modifying the name according to the value of the property.

returns.span: 與輸入識別項相同的字串，或已修改第一個字母大小寫的字串。

span.span: A string that is the same as the input identifier or has the first letter's case modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果值屬性是`true`和輸入的第一個字元是字母，它由小寫，如有必要。If the value of the property is `true` and the first character of the input is a letter, it is made lowercase, if necessary. 如果值是`false`、 Pascal 大小寫作用中，第一個字元，如果一個字母大寫，如有必要。If the value of the is `false`, Pascal case is in effect and the first character, if a letter, is capitalized, if necessary.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string MakeUnique(string identifier) cil managed
Public Function MakeUnique (identifier As String) As String

param.name: identifier
param.span: 要修改的名稱 (如果原本不是唯一的話)。

span.span: The name to modify if it is not already unique.

summary.span: 判斷輸入名稱是否與 執行個體之範圍內的其他名稱發生衝突，如果有的話，則產生修改的字串。

span.span: Determines whether the input name conflicts with another name within the instance's scope and, if it does, generates a modified string.

returns.span: 識別項參數值，但如果發生名稱衝突，則為修改的字串。

span.span: The identifier parameter value or a modified string if there is a name collision.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 輸入的名稱不是唯一，如果它先前傳遞至， ，或方法，或如果它由產生方法。The input name is not unique if it was passed previously to the , , or method, or if it was generated by the method. 如果名稱不是唯一的新的字串會產生將附加到原始的字串。If the name is not unique, a new string is generated by appending to the original string. 如果您想要控制繫結至 XML 結構描述或 Web 服務定義的程式碼實體的名稱，使用相關聯的屬性而建立的執行個體類別。If you want to control the names of code entities that are bound to XML Schema or Web service definitions, use the associated attributes rather than creating an instance of the class. 如需完整清單，請參閱 < [ 屬性控制 XML 序列化的](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md)。For a complete list, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseCamelCasing { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseCamelCasing : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出執行個體是否會使用 Camel 命名法的大小寫慣例。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the instance uses camel case.

value.span: 表示執行個體會使用 Camel 命名法的大小寫慣例，而 則表示執行個體會使用 Pascal 命名法的大小寫慣例。

span.span: to indicate that the instance uses camel case; to indicate that the instance uses Pascal case.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用駝峰式大小寫，如果識別項的第一個字元是字母，就必須是小寫。With camel case, if the first character of an identifier is a letter, it must be lowercase. 使用 Pascal 大小寫慣例，如果第一個字元是字母，就必須是大寫。With Pascal case, if the first character is a letter, it must be uppercase.
